Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.models

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.common.models.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameImpl
    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements Displayable, java.io.Serializable
    This class contains the information that a player needs to know the state of the game

      • canMove

        @Contract(pure=true)
public boolean canMove​(@Nullable
                       @Nullable java.awt.Point from,
                       @Nullable
                       @Nullable java.awt.Point to,
                       int maxStep)
        Determines if a player can move from "from" to "to" with "maxStep" steps
        Parameters:
        from - start point
        to - end point
        maxStep - usable steps
        Returns:
        true if "to" is attainable from "from" point with at most "maxStep" steps, false otherwise

        @NotNull
public @NotNull java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBackImage()
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Displayable
        Get the back image associated. Each call read the image from fs and store it in an BufferedImage, so there is a delay when the method is invoked.
        Specified by:
        getBackImage in interface Displayable
        Returns:
        The image associated.
        Throws:
